title: The Waters of Skagerrak
description: Fierce Vikings and mystical Sirens face each other in a never-ending battle to claim the most significant natural resource their world has to the sea itself.For generations, Viking clans have faced Siren tribes in battles waged on land and sea—battles that pit brute strength against sorcery and cunning versus charm. Their war has torn apart the very world they fight over while filling graveyards that span farther than the eye can see.These are the tales of their mythical encounters. These are the tales of the Sirens of the Norse Sea .
author: Françoise Ruscak
